elements.name: willSearchDownloadExplanation
elements.title:
This step will help you fill out the "Application for Search of Wills Notice". You need to do this step even if {deceasedName} did not make a `Will` so that The Court sees extra evidence that there is no Will.

If you have already applied for a Search of Wills Notice, ensure that it was done with all of the names you identified in the Form P10.

If there are different spellings or versions of {deceasedName}'s name on the Form P10 that aren't in your original Search of Wills Notice, you will need to do another "Application for Search of Wills Notice" with the extra names.

Click here to download a blank "Application for Search of Wills Notice". (This link opens in a new tab)

To open the PDF, you may need Adobe Reader (free to download) or other similar software.

Click here to down Adobe Reader for free. (This link opens in a new tab)

elements.name: willSearchTipsInstructions
elements.title: Below are some tips on how to fill out the Application for Search of Wills Notice.

elements.name: willSearchTip1
elements.title:
Applicant's Information

"RELATIONSHIP TO THE SUBJECT OF THE WILL SEARCH" means your relationship to {deceasedName}. This should be either spouse or child.

elements.name: willSearchTipA
elements.title:
SECTION A - APPLICATION FOR WILLS SEARCH

Make sure you have a photo copy of the `Certificate of Death` included when you send your "Application fo Search of Wills Notice."

elements.name: willSearchTipB
elements.title:
SECTION B - SOLICITORS OR NOTARIES ONLY

Leave this section blank.

elements.name: willSearchTipC
elements.title:
SECTION C - SEARCH REQUEST DETAILS

"SURNAME" also means Last Name or Family name.
"Given Name" also means First Name and Middle Names.

When you fill out the names, start with the Surname, and then add the given names.
    For example, with Alex Bowie Clark, the Surname is Clark and the given names are Alex Bowie. For this form, write the name in as Clark, Alex Bowie.
Make sure to include all the the different spellings and versions of {deceasedName}'s name you wrote down for the Form P10.

elements.name: willSearchTipPrint
elements.title:
Save the document

Save and Print the information you entered into the Application for Search of Wills Notice.

Send the Application for Search of Wills Notice to Vital Statistics Agency using the contact information on Page 2. This form does not go to The Court.

Vital Statistics Agency will send you a document called "Search of Wills Notice" when they are done with their search. You will need to include 2 copies of the "Search of Wills Notice"in your application to The Court.
